package.name: randfold
package.readme:
RANDFOLD - A randsomization test for sequence secondary structure Copyright (C) 2005 Eric Bonnet - Bioinformatics & Evolutionary Genomics - VIB -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
This is RANDFOLD version 2. The software compute the probability that, for a given sequence, the Minimum Free Energy (MFE) of the secondary structure is different from MFE computed with random sequences.
For more information, see the paper published in Bioinformatics:
Bonnet E, Wuyts J, Rouze P, Van de Peer Y. Evidence that microRNA precursors, unlike other non-coding RNAs, have lower folding free energies than random sequences. Bioinformatics. 2004 Nov 22;20(17):2911-7. PMID: 15217813
